titles.title: The Joy Of The Lord Is My Strength

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: The joy of the Lord is my strength. (4x)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
If you want joy, you should sing for it. (3x)
The joy of the Lord is my strength.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
He gives me living water, and I thirst no more. (3x)
The joy of the Lord is my strength.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
El gozo del Señor es mi fortalesa es (4x)
Si tienes gozo verdadero tienes que cantar (3x)
El gozo del Señor es mi fuerza.
